AOI_API_KEY: Replace with your AOI API key
GEOCODING_API_KEY: Replace with your Geocoding API Key
DALLE_DEPLOYMODEL: Replace with your DALL-E deploy model
LOGIC_APP_CLIENT_ID: Replace with your Logic App Client ID
LOGIC_APP_SCOPE: Replace with you Logic App Scope
LOGIC_APP_URL: Replace with your Logic App URL
AI_SEARCH_URL: Replace with your AI Search URI
AI_SEARCH_KEY: Replace with your AI Search API Key
